metadataAttributes.Title: Data Engineering Foundations Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Build the Foundation for a Data Engineering Career. Develop hands-on experience with Python, SQL, and Relational Databases and master the fundamentals of the Data Engineering ecosystem.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Information Engineering, Python Programming, Extraction, Transformation And Loading (ETL), Relational Database Management System (RDBMS), SQL, Data Science, Database (DBMS), NoSQL, Data Analysis, Pandas, Numpy, Jupyter notebooks,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Rav Ahuja ,Priya Kapoor ,Joseph Santarcangelo ,Ramesh Sannareddy ,Sandip Saha Joy ,Lin Joyner ,Rose Malcolm ,Hima Vasudevan ,
